description.en:
Mao-chan is a cheeky high school girl who loves to tease her virgin big (step)brother in naughty ways. 

However, her true intention is actually...?

(Source: BookLive)

---

Note: the original Pixiv series has been collected and published into 2 volumes.
Volume 1 contains chapters 1-20. Volume 2 contains chapters 21-42.

* Alternative Official Raw - [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/20063387/vol_no/001)
description.ja: 真桜(まお)ちゃんは童貞のお兄ちゃんをえっちにからかうのが大好きな生意気JK。だけどその本意は実は…?

altTitles.ja: 性別バグが発生しました！？

description.en: Sakuma Haru is a high school freshman boy who loves games. He is a coward who often tries to please those around him and has a hard time saying no, always relying on Minatsuki Karen, who goes to the same school. One day, a loud thunderclap rings through the school, and before he knows it, Sakuma has turned into a girl! When he wakes up, he finds himself in the world of his favorite game, "Mirage Universe," and due to a game bug, Sakuma and Minatsuki have switched genders!?

Twelve years ago, the powerful Nine-Tailed Demon Fox attacked the ninja village of Konohagakure. The demon was quickly defeated and sealed into the infant Naruto Uzumaki, by the Fourth Hokage who sacrificed his life to protect the village. Now Naruto is the number one knucklehead ninja who's determined to become the next Hokage and gain recognition by everyone who ever doubted him!
description.pt-br: Versão totalmente colorida do famoso mangá "Naruto". Uzumaki Naruto é um garoto que teve um demônio preso dentro dele quando era um bebê, para evitar que esse demônio destruísse sua vila. Ele cresceu sendo temido por todos, já que existe a lembrança dos mortos pelo demônio em quase todas as famílias. Evitado e ignorado, tudo o que ele realmente deseja é ser amado e reconhecido pelos outros, pelo que de fato ele é. Acompanhe a vida de Naruto, seu amor pela "doce e amável" Sakura e sua "amizade" com Sasuke... Uma história aparentemente simples, em que o herói acumula poderes e vence os malvados, fazendo amigos no caminho, certo? Errado. Naruto tem ação e comédia, sim, mas o tema central do mangá é a solidão e como cada um dos personagens lida com essa solidão. A leveza cômica de alguns capítulos é francamente contrastante com o clima pesado e trágico de outros.

description.ar: بايك قيهو الذي يحب السماء أكثر من الناس، لذا كل ما تلتقطه كاميراته هو السماء. في أحد أيام الصيف، تنتقل فتاة تدعى "هانيول" والذي يعني اسمها "سماء" إلى صف قيهو لتجلس بجانبه.
description.en: Baek Gihu, who loves the sky more than people, takes pictures of the sky with his camera. One summer day, a girl named "Haneul"—her name means "Sky"—transfers to his class and sits in the seat next to him.

Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty-two years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

---

**Note:**  
**Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, English fan translations of One Piece are unable to be posted at this time. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-piece) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US). The three most recent chapters can also be read on MangaPlus for free by clicking the chapter links below.**

---
- **The Best-Selling Manga in History**
- **Won the 41st Japan Cartoonists Association Award Grand Prize alongside Neko Darake in 2012** 
- **Received the Kumamoto Prefecture Honorary Prize in 2018**
description.es: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.ru: Последние слова, произнесённые Королем Пиратов Гол Д. Роджером перед казнью, вдохновили многих выйти в море: «Мои сокровища? Я завещаю их тому, кто сможет их найти. Ищите! Я все оставил в одном месте!». Лишённые сна и покоя люди ринулись на Гранд Лайн, самое опасное место в мире. Так началась великая эра пиратов… Но с каждым годом романтиков становилось все меньше, их постепенно вытесняли прагматичные пираты-разбойники, которым награбленное добро было куда ближе, чем какие-то «никчёмные мечты». Но вот, одним прекрасным днем, семнадцатилетний Монки Д. Луффи исполнил заветную мечту детства - отправился в море. Его цель — ни много, ни мало стать новым Королём Пиратов. За достаточно короткий срок юному капитану удаётся собрать команду, состоящую из не менее амбициозных искателей приключений. И пусть ими движут совершенно разные устремления, главное, этим ребятам важны не столько деньги и слава, сколько куда более ценное – принципы и верность друзьям. И ещё – служение Мечте. Что же, пока по Гранд Лайн плавают такие люди, Великая Эра Пиратов всегда будет с нами!
description.uk:
Король піратів Ґолд Роджер буде страчений Світовим урядом. Прямо перед смертю він підтвердив існування великого скарбу «Ван Піс», який знаходиться десь на величезному морі Ґранд Лайн. Як тільки Роджер сказав, що будь-хто гідний досягти Ван Пісу може забрати його собі, його стратили, і почалася Велика ера піратів.

Двадцять два роки потому, молодий хлопець на ім’я Монкі Д. Луффі готовий почати свою пригоду по пошуку Ван Пісу та здобуванню титулу Короля піратів. Маючи при собі солом’яну шапку, невеличкий човен та еластичне тіло, він вирушає у неймовірну подорож, щоб зібрати собі команду та хороший корабель, який зможе пронести їх через весь Ґранд Лайн, щоб стати найвеличнішими в усіх морях.
description.es-la: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.pt-br: One Piece começa quando Gol D. Roger, o Rei Dos Piratas que possuiu tudo nesse mundo, antes de ser executado, diz que escondeu o seu tesouro em algum lugar da Grand Line, um oceano extremamente perigoso. Desde então muitos piratas se aventuram pela Grand Line para tentar encontrar o tesouro chamado One Piece. Um deles é Monkey D. Luffy, o garoto que, acidentalmente, comeu uma das Akuma No Mi, a Gomu Gomu No Mi (Fruta da Borracha), e agora ele pode esticar seu corpo como se fosse uma borracha. A jornada dele começa atrás de companheiros e um barco, que ele vai conseguindo pouco a pouco, pois tem um objetivo: Ser o Rei Dos Piratas!!

description.ar: لقد قتلت من قبل الخونة وبعد أن عدت . قررت هذه المرة أن أكون صداقة معهم . . لأنه إذا أصبحت صديقه لهم ، فلن يقتلوني . لكن " هل يمكنك فقط السماح لي بالذهاب عندما ينتهي الأمر لقد أملت رأسي وسألت ، لكن العيون المحدقة بي قد تعمقت بعطش مجهول " ماذا يمكنني أن أفعل ؟ ليس لدي أي نية لترككِ تذهبين . " ردود الفعل هذه غريبة نوعا ما ؟ "
description.en: Arabella is a forgotten outcast princess who vomits blood whenever she moves. After being killed during the rebellion against the oppression of the imperial family which inherited the dragon's blood, she returns to the time before her 20th birthday. Realizing that she must survive until her 25th birthday in order to stop the regression cycle, Arabella decides to look for a way to cure her illness, even if it means seeking answers from the rebel forces themselves.
description.fr: Arabella est la princesse oubliée et maladive qui vomit du sang dès qu'elle bouge. Elle revient après avoir été tuée lors d'une rébellion contre l'oppression de la famille impériale dirigée par celui qui a hérité du sang du dragon. Elle doit survivre jusqu'à son 25e anniversaire pour s'assurer que sa régression est terminée. Arabella décide de trouver une réponse auprès des rebelles afin de prolonger sa vie.
description.it: Arabella è una principessa dimenticata che vomita sangue ogni volta che si muove. Dopo essere stata uccisa durante la ribellione contro l'oppressione della famiglia imperiale, ritorna al tempo prima del suo ventesimo compleanno. Rendendosi conto che deve sopravvivere fino al suo 25° compleanno per fermare il ciclo di regressione, Arabella decide di cercare un modo per curare la sua malattia, anche se questo significa cercare risposte dalle stesse forze ribelli.
description.ko:
움직이면 피를 토하는 잊혀진 찬밥 황녀 아라벨라. 
드래곤의 피를 이어받은 황실의 압제에 맞서 일어나는 반란 사건 때 죽임을 당한 후 회귀한다. 
자신이 25살의 생일까지 살아남아야 회귀가 끝난다는 것을 알게 된 
아라벨라는 생명 연장을 위해 반란군에게서 답을 찾기로 결심한다.
description.pt: Arabella é uma princesa esquecida que vomita sangue sempre que se move. Depois de ser morta durante a rebelião contra a opressão da família imperial, ela retorna à época anterior ao seu 20º aniversário. Percebendo que deve sobreviver até seu 25º aniversário para interromper o ciclo de regressão, Arabella decide buscar uma forma de curar sua doença, mesmo que isso signifique buscar respostas das próprias forças rebeldes.
description.vi:
Arabella là một cô công chúa bị lãng quên, luôn nôn ra máu khi di chuyển. Một cuộc nổi loạn đã diễn ra để chống lại sự áp bức bóc lột của hoàng gia. Về sau khi bị giết chết liên tiếp, cô phát hiện ra rằng quá trình trở về quá khứ sẽ chỉ kết thúc nếu cô sống sót cho đến sinh nhật thứ 25 của mình
.
Arabella quyết tâm tìm ra câu trả lời từ phe nổi dậy để kéo dài sự sống.
description.zh-hk:
阿拉貝拉，是一位因為體弱容易吐血而被遺忘受冷落的公主。

在受繼承龍族血統的皇室壓迫而發生的叛亂事件的時候，遭遇死亡之後復活。

明白自己到25歲的生日復活就結束的阿拉貝拉，決心為了延續生命從叛軍那裡尋找答案。

description.en: Yuki, a girl living in a rural town, studies art with the goal of becoming a painter in the city. One day, her sister leaves the town to fulfill her own dreams. Yuki boards the train with her to see her off, but during the journey, she is struck by a strange phenomenon!? Is it reality or an illusion... A chilling horror.
What happens when a girl from a quaint and small town meets the son of a Yakuza crime lord? Will she be able to change him for the better or will he continue down the dangerous and violent path?

The story of Nanakura Rin of the Drama Club, who has indisputable talent as an actress, and her senpai in the same club, Kitahama Eiji. With the power of her acting, Rin teases Eiji with a variety of personas, giving him the harem he's always dreamed of!
description.fr: Voici l'histoire de Nanakura Rin du club de drama, ayant un talent indiscutable en tant qu'actrice, et de son senpai Kitahama Eiji. Grâce à ses talents d'actrice, Rin taquine Eiji avec multiples personnalités, lui donnant le harem dont il a toujours rêvé.
description.it: Questa è la storia di Nanakura Rin del club di teatro, che ha un talento indiscutibile come attrice, e del suo senpai Kitahama Eiji. Grazie al suo talento di attrice, Rin prende in giro Eiji con molteplici personalità, dandogli l'harem che ha sempre sognato.
description.pl:
Historia dwojga członków Klubu Teatralnego – Rin Nanakury i jej Senpaia – Kitahamy Eijiego.  
Rin, przy użyciu swoich aktorskich umiejętności, odgrywa różnorodne postacie, tworząc tym samym Senpaiowi jego wymarzony harem!
description.pt: Rin Nanakura, uma talentosa atriz do clube de teatro, e o seu veterano no mesmo clube, Eiji Kitahama. Com suas habilidade de atuação, Rin brinca com Eiji fazendo várias personagens, e montando o harém (de uma pessoa só) que ele sempre sonhou!
description.uk: Історія про Нанакуру Рін, яка має талант до акторства, та Кітахаму Ейджі - її семпая, який мріє про власний гарем.
description.pt-br: A história de Nanakura Rin do Clube de Drama, que tem talento indiscutível como atriz, e seu senpai do mesmo clube, Kitahama Eiji. Com o poder de sua atuação, Rin provoca Eiji com uma variedade de personagens, dando-lhe o harém com que ele sempre sonhou!

description.en: The manga follows Ami Kurata, a first year college student with no special qualities. One day she happens to notice someone riding a folding bike, immediately falls in love with it, and uses all her savings to buy one. She eventually gets introduced to the world of long-distance bicycling and road racer bikes, and she forms a cycling team called Fortuna with four other female college students from the same school. Their goal is to ride in a "brevet" or long-distance event called "flèche."

title.en: Punishing Gray Raven: Engraved in the Heart       (Doujinshi)

description.en:
Two worlds, each fighting a war against a deadly virus. And a chance meeting between two lone inhabitants, one of each world, both bearing the scars of their struggling civilizations.

The captivating musician Selena, a famous opera singer who became a soldier due to her desire to experience and preserve relics of the old world.

But it's been more than a year since Selena went MIA, as she was captured by enemy forces and subjected to experiments with the virus. However, she has since escaped captivity- at the cost of her memories. Her appearance having changed due to the virus, she now wanders the broken lands, searching for purpose.

Meanwhile, a recent college graduate ends up jobless due to the 2019 Covid Pandemic and isolated from society. But soon after, they inadvertently find themselves phasing out of their reality and shifting into another earth far different than their own- a world identical to a game they own, and the very world Selena lives in. Inevitably, the two cross paths.

This is the beginning of their story.

title.en: Uma Musume Pretty Derby - Your Shadow Tracen (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: あなたのヤミトレセン学園

description.en: Gag doujinshi made by Bacius featuring characters from Uma Musume Pretty Derby.

Heo Jeong-woo, a high school student who is bullied by a girl in his class for his weakness.
 
Han Bo-ra, a transfer student, comes to Jeong-woo's class, where he was spending his miserable days.

Jeong-woo feels a strong sense of déjà vu when he sees the child with straight black hair and stains on his legs. Sure enough, Han Bo-ra, who has subdued the arguing classmates, asks them.

"'Have you ever seen a child similar to me?

Jeong-woo decides to approach Bo-ra, who might be able to correct what is wrong...

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?originalProductId=522173)
description.ko:
같은 반 여자애에게 약점을 잡혀 괴롭힘 당하는 고등학생 '허정우'. 피폐한 나날을 보내던 정우의 반에 전학생 '한보라'가 온다. 까만 생머리와 다리에 얼룩을 가진 그 아이를 보고 정우는 강한 기시감을 느낀다. 아니나다를까, 시비 거는 반 아이들을
제압한 한보라는 그들에게 묻는다. '나랑 비슷한 애 본 적 있어?' 어쩌면 꼬인 것을 바로잡아줄 보라에게 정우는 접근하기로 하는데...

altTitles.ja: ふたりぼっちのオタサーの姫

altTitles.ja-ro: Futaribocchi no Otaku Circle no Hime

altTitles.en: The Otaku Circle's Princess in a Club of Two

description.en: Ooyama Takeko joins an otaku club in the hopes of being worshiped as a princess as she'd be the only female member, but the club she joins only has two members (including herself). Based on a one shot of the same name.
description.ja: 『小林さんちのメイドラゴン』などアニメ化多数の大人気作家が、初の週刊連載でYJに大登場！ 「ヲタクさんたちに”ちやほや”されたい！」 ”姫”を目指して大山武子が入ったオタサーは…、部員が二人しかいなかった！ 1年たっても二人っきりのサークルで、大山は立派な姫になれるのか!? 満たせ欲求！目指せ姫！天然ダメっ娘オタサーコメディ、開幕！

altTitles.ja: 夜明けのヴァンパイア
インタビュー・ウィズ・ヴァンパイア

description.en:
From Mangaupdates:  
Manga adaptation of the work by Anne Rice. It was later renamed as Interview with (the) Vampire.  
  
Louis and Lestat are two vampires living in the 1700s who have a platonic love/hate relationship. Louis is about to leave Lestat but suddenly Lestat turns a little girl (Claudia) into a vampire and Louis can't leave her…But what happens when Claudia's mind matures but her body stays the same.

Rakugo--the ultimate form of storytelling, where everything in a story is expressed with just your body and words. Shinta and his daughter Akane have been seduced by this wonderful form of classical entertainment. Having observed her father strive to pass the shin'uchi rakugo test, Akane will take her own steps into this unique world!
description.fr:
Shinta s'est perfectionné 13 ans durant afin d'atteindre le statut de Shin'uchi, le plus haut rang des rakugo-ka. Mais malgré sa très bonne performance lors de l'examen de passage, le juge de l'épreuve, l'émérite Maître Arakawa Issho, a décidé de renvoyer de l'école Arakawa l'ensemble des participants sans donner davantage d'explication ! Ainsi s'arrêta nette la carrière de Shinta, qui avait tant sacrifié pour accomplir son rêve…
Mais Akane, la fille de Shinta qui admirait son père et son rakugo plus que tout, ne compte pas en rester là !
description.th:
ที่สุดแห่งศิลปะการเล่าเรื่องที่ใช้ผู้แสดงเพียงหนึ่งคนและเรื่องเล่าเพียงหนึ่งเรื่อง --- "ราคุโกะ" นักราคุโกะ อาราคาวะ ชินตะและอาคาเนะลูกสาวของเขาต่างก็หลงเสน่ห์ของความบันเทิงอันสุดแสนจะเรียบง่ายนี้ ในวันที่ชินตะขึ้นเวทีแสดงในการสอบเลื่อนชั้นเป็นชินอุจิ อาคาเนะเองก็ได้ชมการแสดงนั้นอยู่และเส้นทางของนักราคุโกะที่อาคาเนะตัดสินใจก้าวเดินไปก็คือ---- มังงะราคุโกะขนานแท้ที่เหล่านักราคุโกะล้วนมาประชันฝีมือฟาดฟันกันได้เปิดฉากขึ้นแล้ว!

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.pt-br: Rakugo - a forma perfeita de contar histórias, na qual tudo na história é expresso apenas com seu corpo e palavras. Shinta e sua filha, Akane, foram seduzidos por essa maravilhosa forma clássica de entretenimento. Observando seu pai treinar para passar no teste de Shin’uchi, Akane avança neste mundo único.

description.en:
Yotsuba is a strange little girl with a big personality! Even in the most trivial, unremarkable encounters, Yotsuba's curiosity and enthusiasm quickly turns the everyday into the extraordinary!

---
- **Won the Excellence Award for Manga at the Japan Media Arts Festival in 2006**


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2007)
description.ru:
Повседневная жизнь Ёцубы Койвай полна приключений. Она активная, любопытная и немного эксцентричная девочка. Настолько эксцентричная, что её отец прозвал её странной и несведущей в вещах, которые должны знать даже пятилетки. Из-за этого самое простое событие для неё становится настоящим приключением. Проходят дни, Ёцуба заводит новых друзей и показывает всем на личном примере, что каждый день может быть в радость.

---

(Source: [shikimori](https://shikimori.one/mangas/104-yotsuba-to))

title.en: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! Event Diary

altTitles.ja: バンドリ！ ガールズバンドパーティ！ イベントダイアリー

description.en: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! Event Diary (バンドリ！ガールズバンドパーティ！ イベントダイアリー) is a comicalization of the event stories from the game Girls Band Party! by Kurobuchi Kashiko.

altTitles.ja: 真夜中ハートチューン

altTitles.en: Tune In to the Midnight Heart

altTitles.pt-br: Sintonizando com o Coração da Meia Noite
Em busca da garota por trás da voz

description.en:
"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people?
___
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)
description.ja:
「深夜ひとり、ベッドの上、キミの声だけが救いだった。もう一度キミと話したい。言いたいことがあるんだ」。

高校2年生の山吹有栖は、「アポロ」という名の、顔も本名も知らないラジオ配信者の少女を探していた。だがある日、有栖は進学先の高校の放送部にアポロの手がかりを得る。そこにいたのは「声に関わる仕事に就く」夢を描く美少女が…4人!! アポロは誰？4人の夢の行方は？かわいくも懸命なサクセスラブコメ、ここに開演!!
description.ru:
«Пока я лежал на кровати посреди ночи в полном одиночестве, твой голос был моим единственным утешением. Я хочу поговорить с тобой ещё раз. И должен кое-что тебе сказать».

Ямабуки Арису, ученик второго класса старшей школы, ищет бывшую ведущую радио-стримов «Аполло», не зная ни её лица, ни имени. Однако, однажды он понимает, что Аполло скрывается среди участниц клуба радиовещания в его школе. Четыре красавицы оттуда мечтают получить работу, связанную с голосом. Но которая из них — Аполло? И что станет с их мечтами? Милый ромком о тяжёлом труде и успехе начинается!
description.pt-br: Yamabuki Arisu, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, estava procurando por uma garota chamada “Apollo”, que era locutora de rádio e ele não conhecia seu rosto ou seu nome verdadeiro. No entanto, um dia, Arisu recebe uma pista sobre Apollo do clube de transmissão da escola secundária para a qual ela estava indo. Havia quatro belas garotas que sonhavam em “conseguir um emprego relacionado à voz”!! Quem é Apollo? O que acontecerá com os sonhos dessas quatro pessoas? Uma comédia romântica fofa, mas trabalhadora e de sucesso, começa aqui!!

description.en:
Choboraunyopomi x Vanguard

The crazy unit comedy four-panel story begins!

Historical Action about a police officer hunting down the "La Llorona" mexican crime cartel. After catching a bunch of high-ranking members, suddenly a Yellowstone volcano errupts & the cop time-leaps to the 19th wild west a few days after Lincoln got assassinated. He steps into a gruesome scene of native americans getting slaughtered. But suddenly the supposedly dead Abrahalm Lincoln appears and kills the attackers.

The world's most easy-to-understand and hot loop manga!

An organization that saves people who have tragically died, the Space-Time Police Special Task Force, also known as the "Rewind Officers"! Their weapon is the time machine "Retry Eye" embedded in their right eye! Rewind time dozens, hundreds, thousands of times until you solve the case! The first loop manga in CoroCoro's 45-year history, a must-see!
description.vi: Biệt đội cơ động cảnh sát thời không, hay còn gọi tắt là "Cảnh sát thời gian" (Người tua ngược/Rewinder) là một tổ chức giải cứu những người có cái chết bất đắc kì tử! Họ sử dụng một cỗ máy thời gian ở mắt phải "Retry Eye"! Những cảnh sát thời gian có thể quay ngược thời gian hàng chục, hàng trăm tới hàng nghìn lần cho đến khi phá được vụ án! Bộ truyện từng lập kỷ lục suốt 1 năm liền đứng đầu liên tục trong danh sát truyện yêu thích của tạp chí Corocoro Comic.

title.en: Ore no tomodachi ♂♀ ga kawai sugite komaru!

altTitles.en: 俺の友達♂♀が可愛すぎて困る！
My Childhood Friend Is So Cute, It's Frustrating!
I Am Worried That My Childhood Friend Is Too Cute!

altTitles.vi: Người bạn thời thơ ấu của tôi quá dễ thương!

description.en: "If my guy friend turned into a girl, he would be the perfect girlfriend!" Returning to his hometown after 10 years, Amano Koichi is thrilled to finally reunite with his childhood friend, Yukio Sawatari on the first day of school when suddenly, he turns female! Yukio is affected by "Sudden sex change syndrome", a rare condition present in one every ten thousand people which randomly changes their gender!Koichi can't help but be flustered by his childhood friend's cuteness. How will this complicate their relationship? Will it develop into a forbidden romance?! Find out in this exciting TSF Rom-com!
description.id:
Amano, yang kembali ke kota tempat dia tinggal sewaktu kecil untuk pertama kalinya setelah 10 tahun, bertemu Yukio Sawatari, seorang teman masa kecil di hari pertama pemindahan, ketika dia (seorang teman pria) menjadi wanita! Meskipun dia berbagi suka citanya, saat dia tiba-tiba berubah menjadi seorang gadis dan tidak bisa menyembunyikan rasa malunya. Yukio terkena penyakit seperti 100.000 orang lainnya, tiba-tiba menjadi seorang gadis yang disebut "spontaneous isomerism metamorphosis"!  
  
Teman masa kecil perempuan ♂ yang imut dan dalam kesulitan!? Cinta TSF (transeksual) Terlarang!  
  
Kalo gak paham baca ajalah, ada sinopsis juga gak guna.
description.vi:
Khi trở về thành phố nơi từng sống sau 10 năm, Amano Koichi đã gặp lại người bạn tuổi thơ là Yukio Sawatari vào ngày đầu tiên ở trường mới thì bỗng nhiên Yukio lại đổi giới tính?! Anh bị ảnh hưởng bởi một căn bệnh chỉ có trong một trong mười nghìn người gọi là "hội chứng đổi giới đột ngột"! 

Từ đây bắt đầu câu truyện về tình yêu với người bạn tuổi thơ đổi giới.

title.en: Forget My Husband, I'll Go Make Money

altTitles.en: Forget About My Husband, I'd Rather Go Make Money

altTitles.uk: Годі з мене чоловіка - йду заробляти гроші

altTitles.zh: 要什么老公，我只想搞钱

altTitles.en: Forget About My Husband, I'd Rather Go Make Money

altTitles.es-la: Terminé con mi esposo, ahora iré a hacer dinero

description.en:
I became the wife of a husband who has a girlfriend.
Hmm, I shouldn’t bother them, right?

“Then, you sleep on the floor.”
“What?”

It seems that he doesn’t like the idea of it.
Well, the floor is hard after all.
I guess I don’t have any other choice.

“We’ll just sleep while holding hands then. You trust me, right?”

But how did we end up breaking the bed on our first night…?

I am Aristine, an exiled princess who has fallen out of favor with the Emperor.
The truth is, she has the <Monarch’s Eyes>, an ability that allows you to see the past, future, and present.
Sacrificed for a contract marriage, she is bound together with a monstrous barbarian…

“I have to present my wife with the most precious things.”

The future husband who is rumored to be a monster is incredibly normal.

But this cake belongs to someone else.

“I’ll just go and make money.”

It’s long been said that imagining gold as your own will help you manifest wealth.

<Forget My Husband, I’ll Go Make Money>
Will she be able to achieve her dreams of living in freedom while sitting on her piles of money?
Or will she be able to catch both rabbits at the same time?

title.en: I Need Someone to Stop My Older Brothers

altTitles.ko: 누가 우리 오빠들 좀 말려 주세요

description.en:
I only went to calm the disturbance in front of my house, but the one I encountered was the Demon King that I punished, and unfortunately, I was falsely accused of being the demon king and died in the hand of the subjugation team.

‘I’ll kick your ass, Pamel Asinov! I’ll make you shed tears from both of your eyes!’

Among them, the worst one was the hero, Pamel Asinov, who drove me to death as a Demon King!

But when I pleaded to take revenge, I opened my eyes, 500 years later! Pamel’s been dead for a long time, and the ‘brothers’ who came one day…

“Purple eyes. It’s not a color that anyone can have.”
“But I was like this from the beginning.”
“Yes, you were. Because you are the granddaughter of Archduke Asinov.”
“…the granddaughter of Archduke Asinov?”

Of all people, I’m the daughter of ‘that’ Asinov? It’s nice to live a peaceful life, but I was born an enemy’s blood!

‘All the brothers in this house have a habit of hugging people.’

This shitty family. I have to hate them, but why do I keep getting attached to them?

altTitles.ja: 負けヒロインが多すぎる！@comic

altTitles.th: รักครั้งนี้มีคนนกเยอะไปมั้ย?!

altTitles.vi: Có Quá Nhiều Nữ Chính Thua Cuộc! @comic

description.en:
***“Huh? Who are you calling losing?”***

As the background of the class, I, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, witnessed a popular girl–Anna Yanami, getting rejected by another guy.

_“Even though he said we’ll get married. Don’t you think he’s pretty mean?”
“When did he say that?”
“When we were 4 or 5 years old.”_

That doesn’t count, right? With this, the losing heroines like Remon Yakishio from the Track and Field Club, and Chika Komari, from the literature club.

_“Nukumizu-kun. There are two types of girls. Childhood friends or cheating cats.”
“I see. Well, that’s a bold statement.”_

There’s a fortune for those who shine only after losing. Losing Heroines—The curtain to the mysterious coming-of-age story “Makeine” opens now!
___
**Character Designer:** [Imigimuru](https://mangadex.org/author/341a08ca-acbf-49a3-998a-d3451249ec43)

**Additional Links:**  
- [Official LN (JP)](https://www.shogakukan.co.jp/books/09453017)
- [Alternative Raw](https://shogakukan-comic.jp/book-series?cd=51545)
description.ja:
クラスの背景モブ高校生こと温水和彦は、男子に人気のクラスメート・八奈見杏菜が幼馴染にフラれるのを目撃してしまう。
仕方なく八奈見を慰める温水だが、それをきっかけに、様々な負け感あふれる女子たちに絡まれることになり――!?
負けヒロイン――マケインたちと辿る謎の青春が、ここに幕を開ける！
負けてこそ輝く彼女たちに、幸いあれ。
description.vi:
“Hử? Cậu gọi ai là đồ thua cuộc cơ?”

Tôi, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, một nhân vật làm nền trong lớp, chứng kiến cảnh cô nàng nổi tiếng – Anna Yanami bị một nam sinh khác từ chối.

“Dù cho cậu ấy đã từng nói bọn mình sẽ kết hôn đấy. Cậu có thấy cậu ấy quá đáng không?”

“Cậu ấy nói thế vào lúc nào vậy?”

“Hồi bọn tớ 4 hay 5 tuổi gì đó.”

Thế thì đâu có tính?

Cùng với cô nàng còn có những nữ chính thua cuộc khác như Remon Yakishio của Câu lạc bộ Điền kinh và Komari Chika từ Câu lạc bộ Văn học.

“Nukumizu-kun nè, trên đời có hai loại con gái. Một là bạn thuở nhỏ, còn lại là đồ đàn bà giựt bồ.”

“Vậy hả. Chà, một tuyên bố đầy táo bạo ha.”

Có một loại vận mệnh rằng có những người chỉ thực sự toả sáng sau khi đã thua cuộc.

Những nữ chính thua cuộc—Bức màn câu chuyện tuổi mới lớn mang tên “Makein” sẽ lật mở ngay bây giờ!
description.es-la: "¿Eh? ¿A quién llamas perdedor?" Como fondo de la clase, yo, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, fui testigo de cómo una chica popular -Anna Yanami- era rechazada por otro chico. "Aunque dijo que nos casaríamos. ¿No crees que es bastante malo?" "¿Cuándo dijo eso?" "Cuando teníamos 4 o 5 años". Eso no cuenta, ¿verdad? Con esto, las heroínas perdedoras como Remon Yakishio del Club de Atletismo, y Chika Komari, del club de literatura. "Nukumizu-kun. Hay dos tipos de chicas. Las amigas de la infancia o las gatas tramposas". "Ya veo. Bueno, esa es una declaración audaz". Hay una fortuna para los que brillan sólo después de perder. ¡Heroínas perdedoras-El telón de la misteriosa historia de madurez "Makeine" se abre ahora! ["Makeine" es la abreviación del nombre del manga]
description.pt-br: O simples, chato e sem amigos Nukumizu Kazuhiko testemunhou algo completamente desconcertante: a garota popular Yanami Anna foi colocada na friend zone por seu crush e amigo de infância! Na verdade, todas as garotas populares ao redor dele estão sendo rejeitadas da mesma forma pelos garotos de quem gostam. Sem perceber, Kazuhiko se envolve no drama do relacionamento onde todas as heroínas principais estão perdendo o amor! Ele pode manter o ânimo delas e ajudá-las a encontrar a felicidade?

description.en:
Translated from Amazon.com.jp using google translate.

The latest work in the "Super Movable Girl" series, in which a moving beautiful girl figure rushes in and becomes a wife. A romantic comedy in which tiny cute [super movable girls] such as the girl-type planet explorer Nona, the RPG hero Bernoa, and the 2D fighting game character Subaru are involved in the otaku boy Haruto. If there is love, what is the size difference!?

title.en: I Will Not Be The Supporting Character Forever

altTitles.ja: 永遠の脇役なんていない

altTitles.en: There Is No Eternal Supporting Character

description.en:
“Why a supporting character instead of the main character?! And out of all supporting characters, why must I be this girl…” When she came to, she was in the middle of the novel, [Empress Rosalynne], as the supporting priest character, “Elena”. Moreover, the story starts right after Elena messed up a holy ritual and she was treated awfully by everyone around her… “There’s only one way to get out of this! I have to become the tutor of the Emperor’s little brother, Duke Levi!”

Elena thought she could watch over the protagonist of the story, Rosalynne, as the events of the story unfolded at the imperial court, but something was wrong. “Equality between commoners and me, a noble? You better watch yourself!” The protagonist she had admired so much was a villainess that discriminated against others based on their social status.

“I won’t be able to stand it if everything ends up the way she wants!” And so, Elena resolves to change how the story unfolds.

Can she rise from her role as a supporting character and claim the position of protagonist?!

title.en: Hazure Hantei kara Hajimatta Cheat Majutsushi Seikatsu

altTitles.ja: ハズレ判定から始まったチート魔術士生活

altTitles.zh: 从废柴判定开始的魔术士人生

altTitles.en: Life as a Cheat Magician that began with a False Judgment

description.en:
One day, all the eighth grade students were transferred to another world.

The princess of the other world summoned them to make up for their lack of strength. The students are threatened and decide to follow the princess, and they are made to take a magical power test to determine their abilities. While everyone is sorted according to their results, Kokubun Kento's result is a flop.

Judged as useless, he is expelled. However, there is actually a tremendous ability lurking within Kento... 

The life-size eighth grader Kento, together with his fellow skeletons, aims to rescue his classmates!

---

[web novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5782dy/) (jp)
description.ja:
ある日、中学２年生の生徒全員が異世界に転移させられた。

異世界の王女が、戦力不足を補うために彼らを召喚したのだ。脅されて王女に従うことにした生徒たちは、能力を調べる魔力判定を受けさせられる。みんなが結果に応じて振り分けられていくなか、国分健人の判定結果はハズレ。

使い物にならないと判断されて、追放されてしまった。だが、健人の内には実は物凄い能力が潜んでいて… 

等身大の中学２年生の健人が、仲間になったスケルトンとともに同級生たちの救出を目指す！

altTitles.ja: 今日から始める幼なじみ

altTitles.zh-hk: 從今天開始的青梅竹馬

altTitles.zh: 从今天开始的青梅竹马

altTitles.vi: Bạn từ nhỏ kể từ ngày hôm nay

description.en:
Kaede Yuzuki is Kouhei Aida's new neighbor, both at home and in the classroom. Kouhei tries to be friendly with Kaede, but their conversations lead nowhere. But then one day…
___
[Official X Account](https://twitter.com/kyo_osa0420)
description.es-la: Kaede Yuzuki siempre deseó tener un amigo de la infancia como en los mangas que lee. Cuando se mudó al lado de su compañero de clase, Kouhei Aida, él dijo que haría cualquier cosa para ayudarla. Entonces, ¡ella le pidió que fuera su amigo de la infancia! ¡Los dos tienen divertidas aventuras recreando todas las cosas que deberían hacer los amigos de la infancia!

title.en: Tensei-saki wa Akuyaku Reijou no Chichioya deshita ~Kawaii Musume no Shibou Flag wa Zenbu Orimasu~

altTitles.ja: 転生先は悪役令嬢の父親でした～可愛い娘の死亡フラグは全部折ります～

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei-saki ha Akuyaku Reijou no Chichioya deshita ~Kawaii Musume no Shibou Flag ha Zenbu Orimasu~

altTitles.en: I Was Just Reincarnated As The Villainess's Father ~I'll Snap All Of My Cute Daughter's Death Flags~

description.en: Ryuichi, a 44-year-old single father, gets into a traffic accident while protecting his high school daughter Mizuho, ​​who ran away from home after an argument. After losing consciousness and accepting his death, he finds himself in the body of a young man he had never seen before. While panicking, he finds a girl who looks exactly like Mizuho when she was a child, and as he sorts out the situation, it seems that he has been reincarnated as the father of the game's villainess…!?
description.ja: 44歳のシングルファザーの龍一（りゅういち）は口論の末、家を飛び出した女子高生の娘・瑞穂（みずほ）をかばい、交通事故に遭ってしまう。意識が遠のき死を覚悟した後に目覚めると、見知らぬ若い男性の姿になっていた。動揺する中、小さい頃の瑞穂そっくりな少女がいて、状況を整理していくと、どうやらゲームの悪役令嬢の父親に転生してしまったようで……!?

description.en:
Kasane Hayafuji's secret joy in life is seeing Aoyama-san, a waitress at a family restaurant. One night, she saw Aoyama standing alone in the rain. When she tried to help, Aoyama suddenly made her an offer.

"Will you be my big sister?"
description.id:
Menemui Aoyama-san yang bekerja sebagai pelayan di restoran keluarga merupakan arti kehidupan Hayafuji Kasane. Pada suatu hari, Kasane memutuskan membantu Aoyama-san yang tengah berdiam diri di tengah guyuran hujan. Kemudian, Aoyama-san tiba-tiba menawari Kasane perjanjian saudari.

“Bersediakah kamu… menjadi kakakku?”
description.ja: 早藤香沙音はファミレスで働くアオヤマさんに会いに行くことを生きがいにしている。ある日、香沙音は雨の中で佇むアオヤマさんを助けることに。すると彼女は唐突に姉妹契約をもちかけてきて――。

description.en: Worst but New Edition
description.vi: Liên minh Kurotaki sụp đổ, quyền lực của King Joe ở Housen dần bị mai một, Zetton bại trận trước Guriko đưa Suzuran vào thế hỗn loạn, Vũ Trang Chiến Tuyến ngày càng mạnh mẽ và bền bỉ... Trước tình cảnh đó thì ở Toaru bất ngờ xuất hiện một chàng trai đến từ ngoại thành mang tên Tsukishima Hana - kẻ mang ước mơ trở thành thủ lĩnh đầu tiên của toàn bộ Cao Trung Nam Sinh Suzuran vốn luôn hỗn loạn!

title.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Villainess

altTitles.zh: 杀死男主然后成为女魔头

altTitles.ru: Убить главного героя, чтобы стать злодейкой

altTitles.zh-ro: Sha Si Nan Zhu Ranhou Chengwei Nv Mo Tou
Shā Sǐ Nán Zhǔ Ránhòu Chéngwéi Nǚ Mó Tóu

altTitles.en: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Demoness

description.en:
After killing the male lead, the originally innocent girl transformed into a villainess.
Just as she was about to enjoy her newfound freedom, she died a violent death and returned back to the start of the game.
Having carried over with her all the skills she acquired in her previous "playthrough", she was prepared to kill the male lead again; however, the current circumstances seem a bit... strange?
description.ru:
Убив главного героя, девушка становится монстром в глазах других, но, собираясь насладиться свободой, трагично погибает и оказывается в начале игры. Сохранив знания и навыки из прошлой жизни, она собирается повторить своё убийство, однако происходящее кажется немного… странным.
«Да кто же ты такой?!»
description.zh: 杀死男主角后，原小白花女二黑化成了女魔头，正当她快意江湖的时候却暴毙回到游戏的开头。继承了上周目所有能力的她准备先下手为强再次杀死男主，只是现在的情况好像有点……意外？ “不对，你到底谁啊——？！”

title.en: The Café Terrace and Its Goddesses

description.en:
Kasukabe Hayato has been accepted to Tokyo U on his first try. Receiving news of his grandmother's death, he returns to his childhood home, Cafe Terrace Familia, for the first time in three years to find five strange girls there who claim to be "Grandma's Family"! Hayato's unexpected life in a seaside town with these five girls of fate begins here!
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10009/episode/319474) (U.S. Only)
description.ja: 東大現役合格の秀才・粕壁 隼。ケンカ別れしていた祖母の訃報を聞いて、3年ぶりに海辺の町の古びた実家「カフェテラス・ファミリア」に帰ると、そこには見知らぬ５人の女の子が！ しかも彼女たちは「おばあちゃんの家族」を名乗り…!? 運命の女×５との贅沢すぎる共同生活が始まるっ！『涼風』『君町』『風夏』の瀬尾公治が描く一つ屋根の下ハーレム！ どの娘に恋する？どの娘を愛でる？
description.ru: Спустя три года, после ссоры со своей бабушкой, Хаято Касукабэ возвращается в свой родной дом в котором поселилось пять девушек. Выясняется, что бабушка Хаято позволила девушкам жить в этом доме, а те заботились о ней до самой её смерти. Так начинается история Хаято и пяти "Богинь".
description.vi: Kasukabe Hayato đã được nhận vào Đại Học Tokyo ngay trong lần thi đầu tiên. Nhưng sau khi nhận được tin bà nội qua đời, anh trở về ngôi nhà thời thơ ấu của mình, quán cà phê Familia.  Và thấy 5 cô gái lạ mặt tự xưng là "Gia đình của bà"! Cuộc sống mới của Hayato tại một thị trấn ven biển với năm cô gái định mệnh bắt đầu từ đây!

description.en:
Maeda is a new student in the Teiken High School. He stutters when he's nervous and he's rather clumsy. He gets noted immediately because he hits a teacher during the entrance ceremony. Some clubs search to enlist him as they see in him a force they can use to get even with other clubs. But Maeda is a loner and has only one dream: becoming boxing champion. His first objective is to beat the leader of the boxing club. "Rokudenashi" translates as "good for nothing".  
  
The manga focuses more on gang warfare than boxing.
description.es:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.
description.vi:
Maeda Taison, chàng thiếu niên tới từ Osaka mang trong mình ước mơ trở thành nhà vô địch boxing thế giới. Xuyên suốt 3 năm học của cậu không chỉ là những trận đánh, những xung đột mà còn có cả những câu chuyện đầy tính nhân văn.
Huyền thoại của dòng manga yankee Nhật Bản, dù đã kết thúc từ năm 1997 nhưng Rokudenashi Blues (RB) vẫn đang là bộ manga yankee bán chạy nhất mọi thời đại. Vì kết thúc đã lâu nên nội dung của nó có phần "outdate", tuy nhiên vẫn rất đáng đọc.
description.es-la:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.

altTitles.ja: 夢と恋ではつり合わない

altTitles.id: Cinta dan Impian Itu Tidak Bisa Digabung

description.en: Kurata Hikaru has fallen in love with her classmate Kira Kairi at first sight. Now, she's too lovestruck to concentrate on her studies. Her plan? Get Kairi to reject her so she can focus again.
description.id: Kurata Hikaru jatuh cinta pada pandangan pertama dengan teman sekelasnya Kira Kairi. Sekarang, dia jadi terlalu gila cinta dan tidak bisa konsentrasi dengan pelajaran. Jadi, dia berencana meminta Kairi untuk menolak cintanya agar dia bisa kembali fokus belajar lagi.

title.en: Genkai OL-san wa Akuyaku Reijou-sama ni Tsukaetai

altTitles.ja: 限界OLさんは悪役令嬢さまに仕えたい

altTitles.en: The Fed-Up Office Lady Wants to Serve the Villainess

altTitles.zh: 受够了的OL想侍奉反派千金
极限OL想要服侍反派千金大小姐

altTitles.ja-ro: Genkai OL-san wa Akuyaku Reijou-sama ni Tsukaetai

description.en:
A heart-pounding reemployment(!?) story between a fed-up corporate slave and a cold, callous, villainess!

Three years after graduating college, Natori Midori, who once idealized the "grown-up adults" she saw as a child, is working hard at her job as a temporary employee. However, one day, her contract is suddenly terminated for an absurd reason. As she sits there, wondering if there would ever be a workplace for her to devote herself to, her phone flashes and she finds herself in the world of the novel RPG she was playing. And before her eyes is the villainess, Lapis Tenebrae, who betrayed the heroine and committed countless atrocities before losing her life!

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative Official Raw on Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/60556)
description.id:
Sebuah kisah reemployment(!?) yang mendebarkan antara budak perusahaan yang muak dan Villain yang dingin, tidak berperasaan!

Tiga tahun setelah lulus kuliah, Natori Midori, yang pernah mengidealkan "dewasa dewasa" yang dilihatnya sebagai seorang anak, bekerja keras di pekerjaannya sebagai karyawan sementara. Namun, suatu hari, kontraknya tiba-tiba dihentikan karena alasan yang tidak masuk akal. Saat dia duduk di sana, bertanya-tanya apakah akan ada tempat kerja baginya untuk mengabdikan dirinya, teleponnya berkedip dan dia menemukan dirinya berada di dunia RPG baru yang dia mainkan. Dan di depan matanya adalah Villain, Lapis Tenebrae, yang mengkhianati protagonis dan melakukan kekejaman yang tak terhitung jumlahnya sebelum kehilangan nyawanya!

description.en:
The protagonist, Hinata Kuroto, is searching for his sister, who is supposed to have "once existed" but is now forgotten by everyone around him. He receives a letter from the beautiful transfer student, Shirai Shimotsuki, stating, "If you want to know about the whereabouts of your sister, come to the library after school." When Kuroto goes to the library, he finds Shirai inexplicably half-naked and waiting for him. This is a sex and meta-fantasy manga created by Gensei Sahara, the artist behind 'Sex & Dungeon!!

(Source: niconico Manga, translated)
___
[Alt Official Raw (niconico Manga)](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/65209)
description.id: Si protagonis, Kuroto Hinata, mencari-car adiknya yang seharusnya "pernah ada" tapi kini telah dilupakan semua orang yang ada di sekelilingnya. Dia menerima surat dari murid pindahan cantik, Shiroi Shiuku, yang bertuliskan, "kalo kamu ingin tahu keberadaan adikmu, datanglah ke perpustakaan sepulang sekolah." Saat Kuroto ke perpustakaan, dia menemui Shiroi entah kenapa setengah telanjang menunggu dirinya.
description.ja:
黒戸日向(ルビ：くろどひなた)は“かつて存在した”妹のことを探している。そんな日向のもとに転校生の白井下月(ルビ：しろいしづく)から手紙が届く。

「妹の行方について知りたかったら放課後、図書室まで」

日向は手紙を手に図書室に行くと、そこには半裸の下月が待っていた――。

altTitles.ja: 世にも過保護な魔王様

description.en:
Sena Yamada is a second-year in high school. For various reasons, she lives alone. She manages to get by by holding down a part-time job. One day, when she was about to be cheated out of her money, she was rescued by a demon king! He told her that she is a reincarnation of a saint and even asked her to move in with him...?　

The exciting life together of a hardworking JK and a pushy demon king is about to begin!

altTitles.ja: ジャイアントキリング

description.en:
A truly great coach makes the game of soccer interesting! Tatsumi Takeshi is 35 and has spent the last few years coaching in England before being brought back to Japan to coach his old team. His favorite pastime? Causing giant upsets a.k.a. Giant Killing! 

---
Official Release:
- English release by [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/778-giant-killing?utm_source=mgd), [Azuki](https://www.azuki.co/series/giant-killing)
- Indonesian release by Level Comics

---
- In 2010, this manga received the 34th Annual Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga.
description.pt-br: Giant Killing é um mangá que conta a história de um técnico de futebol, ex-jogador japonês, que luta para levar times amadores à vitória contra times campeões. Tatsumi Takeshi jogava profissionalmente no East Tokyo United, o ETU, e era louvado pelos torcedores por dar tudo de si e levar o time à vitória. Certo dia decide sair do Japão para treinar um time amador Europeu, e desde então é considerado “traidor” por alguns japoneses. Então, dois membros da equipe do ETU vão atrás do técnico para que ele treine o time onde um dia foi jogador, para tirar o time do fundo do poço.

description.en: Mozuno Nie is a small, timid boy with a weak personality, often targeted by delinquents, or stumbling into open manholes—just a typical "prey type" with a knack for attracting trouble. One day, an obvious extrovert, a dark-skinned gyaru named Kakao, enters his life. With her loose-fitting uniform, a chest that seems ready to burst, and surprisingly well-defined abs, she's the complete opposite of Mozuno. She takes an interest in him, calling him "Prey" and making him the target of her "hunt"... but what could she be after!?
description.ja: 百舌野二枝は小さくて弱キャラな男の子で、日常でも不良に絡まれたり空いたマンホールに落ちたりと、不幸な「獲物体質」を持っている。そんな彼の前に現れたのは明らかに陽キャ、自分とは対極にいるようなタイプの黒ギャルのカカオ。制服を着崩して、胸は溢れんばかり、なぜか立派な腹筋を持った彼女に目を付けられた百舌野くんは彼女から「獲物くん」と呼ばれて「狩り」の対象にされてしまうが…!?

description.en: A gambling addict from a poor background, Seong barely managed to land a job at a delivery company! On his first day, he received a complaint about a misdelivered package, and he rushed out to resolve it. But when the door opens, the customer on the other side seems a little... unusual? Introducing himself as a sculptor, Mintae asks Seong to model for him. And soon, Seong finds himself baring it all—right down to his lower half?! #CrazyXCrazy #ModelXSculptor #ContractRelationship #MuseTop #ImpulsiveTop #HopelessRomanticTop #VirginTop #InsecureTop #HasNothingAtAllTop #CheerfulBottom #LivelyBottom

Beyond the natural world lies a breed of abnormal beings... “H.A.”, or “Humanized Animals”. They are a hybrid of human and animal, "designed" at the genetic level. 
Possessing astonishing physical capabilities, these H.A. are deployed into scenes of intrigue by certain ambitious individuals, seeking to showcase their true value. 

For what purpose did humans design these beings? Behind it all lies a grand plan connected to the future of humanity!

altTitles.ja: 古見さんは、コミュ症です。

altTitles.vi: Komi - Nữ thần sợ giao tiếp

altTitles.pt-br: Senhorita Komi não consegue se comunicar

altTitles.zh: 古见同学有交流障碍症

description.en:
Komi-san is a beautiful and admirable girl that no one can take their eyes off of. Almost the whole school sees her as the cold beauty that's out of their league, but Tadano Hitohito knows the truth: she's just really bad at communicating with others.

Komi-san, who wishes to fix this bad habit of hers, tries to improve it with the help of Tadano-kun by achieving her goal of having 100 friends.
description.es: Hitohito Tadano acaba de empezar la secundaria alta anhelando que sea pura paz y tranquilidad, pero sus planes se truncan cuando termina sentado al lado de la perfecta Shoko Komi. Ella es linda, inteligente, educada y hasta huele bien. Pero tiene 0 dotes sociales y no sabe cómo corno comunicarse con los demás. Es ahí que Tadano se sube al pony y se propone ayudarla a su compañera hasta que se haga de cien amigos, y con suerte algo más.
description.pl: Komi-san jest piękną i godną podziwu dziewczyną, od której nikt nie może oderwać oczu. Prawie cała szkoła postrzega ją jako zimne piękno, które jest poza ich zasięgiem, ale Tadano Hitohito zna prawdę: młoda piękność po prostu źle komunikuje się z innymi. Komi-san, chce to zmienić, a ma jej w tym pomóc Tadano.
description.es-la: El viaje a 100 amigos comienza con una sola conversación. El mayor sueño de la estudiante de secundaria socialmente ansiosa Shouko Komi es hacer amigos, ¡pero todos en la escuela confunden su ansiedad social paralizante con una reserva fría! Con todo el cuerpo estudiantil manteniendo su distancia y Komi incapaz de pronunciar una sola palabra, la amistad podría estar siempre fuera de su alcance. Tadano Hitohito es un chico ordinario total, y así es como le gusta. Vive para mezclarse con el fondo. Todo eso cambia cuando se encuentra solo en un salón de clases el primer día de la escuela secundaria con la legendaria Komi. Rápidamente se da cuenta de que ella no es distante, sino que tiene problemas para comunicarse con los demás. ¡Ahora ha hecho su misión ayudarla en su búsqueda para hacer 100 amigos!
description.pt-br: Komi-san é uma bela e admirável garota que ninguém consegue tirar os olhos. Quase todos da escola a veem como alguém fora do alcance, mas Tadano Shigeo sabe a verdade: **ela apenas não sabe como se comunicar com os outras pessoas**. Komi-san, que deseja corrigir este mau hábito dela, tenta melhorar com a ajuda do Tadano-kun...

title.en: More Than Lovers, Less Than Friends

altTitles.en: More Than Lovers, Less Than Friends

altTitles.pt-br: Mais Que Amantes, Menos Que Amigos

altTitles.ru: Больше чем любовники, меньше чем друзья

description.en: Ex-AV star Miyako unexpectedly runs into a former coworker at a marriage interview...?! The secretly connected pair are bursting with more pure energy than you can imagine! This cute adult love comedy hits different and will heal your soul.
description.ja: 東京から地元へ戻った宮子のお見合い相手は互いの秘密を握る元お仕事相手だった！　清楚な文学少女を演じていた元AV女優とオラオラ系男を演じていた元AV男優が素の自分に戻って再会した時、この上もなくピュアなラブが始まる…！カラダは恋人以上、ココロは友人未満!?
description.ru: Мияко, уволившаяся с работы и вернувшаяся в родительский дом, затеяла сватовство. Однако второй стороной оказался бывший коллега, знавший разные секреты.
description.pt-br:
A ex-estrela de AV(Adult Videos) Miyako inesperadamente encontra um ex-colega de trabalho em uma entrevista de casamento...?! O par secretamente conectado está repleto de energia mais pura do que você pode imaginar! 

Esta comédia de amor adulto é diferente e vai curar sua alma.

altTitles.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

description.en: A story about a ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.
description.ja:
どんなつらい時でも、見ていてくれる「誰か」がいる。

この世に未練を残してさまよっていた幽霊は、ある日、仕事に疲れた会社員、野崎と出会う。

「俺のことなんて、誰も見てないんだ…」

孤独感に打ちひしがれる野崎。人生の最後に一人ぼっちだった幽霊は、彼の生活を見守ってみることに。仕事に翻弄されながらも必死に日々を送る野崎。やがて彼に新たな出会いが訪れる。忙しない日々の中でこぼれ落ちてしまった気持ちを、野崎は人との関わりの中で、少しずつ取り戻していく――。

description.en:
Keita, a boring university student, is a gachikoi (fan who's seriously in love) otaku of Mimika, the center of the idol group Tetra. Even though he's aware that it's a love that will never happen, he continues to push on with giving her his emotional support. 

On the other hand, as her group's popularity continues to rise, Mimika bears anxiety over the uncertainty of the future even while she's happy with the fervently cheering Keita's affection. 

One day, Mimika falls into despair after her mother gets into a traffic accident, and with the help of social media, she heads towards Keita's part-time workplace...
description.ja:
NMB48の安部若菜が本気で描く、禁断の「アイドル×オタク」恋愛小説を待望のコミカライズ！

冴えない大学生のケイタは、アイドルグループ「テトラ」のセンター・実々花の“ガチ恋”オタク。叶わぬ恋だとわかりながらも、彼女を心の支えとして推し続けている。一方、実々花は、グループの人気が順調に上がり、熱心に応援してくれるケイタの好意を嬉しく思いながらも、将来に漠然とした不安を抱えていた。ある日、実々花は母親との衝突をきっかけに自暴自棄になり、SNSの情報を頼りにケイタのバイト先へ向かってしまい……。

title.en: S-Kyuu Boukensha ga Ayumu Michi: Tsuihou Sareta Shounen wa Shin no Nouryoku 'Buki Master' de Sekai Saikyou ni Itaru

altTitles.ja: Ｓ級冒険者が歩む道　 ～追放された少年は真の能力『武器マスター』で世界最強に至る～

altTitles.ja-ro: S-Class Boukensha ga Ayumu Michi ~Tsuihou Sareta Shounen wa Shin no Nouryoku "Buki Master" de Sekai Saikyou ni Itaru~

altTitles.en: The path of an S-class adventurer ~The exiled boy becomes the world's strongest with his true ability ``Weapon Master''~

altTitles.vi: Sau Khi Bị Trục Xuất, Tôi Trở Thành Mạnh Nhất Thế Giới Với Chúc Phúc "Bậc Thầy Vũ Khí"

description.en:
Han Haneul, who dreams of being in a campus romance, witnesses a drug deal involving a crazy-looking man. Shaken to the core, Hanuel desperately flees… However, as if by fate, he encounters the drug dealer, Choi Dajung, again in a club he joined to follow his favorite sunbae. And somehow, Dajung ends up at his apartment…?! Get ready for a sweet, fluffy romance with a head-in-the-clouds Haneul and the unexpectedly charming Dajung, spinning into a warm and fuzzy unrequited love!
#CampusDrama #Comedy #Cuteness #Misunderstandings #UnrequitedLove #YoungerSeme #OlderUke #PetiteUke #VirginSeme
